评论详情: This fits great since it is adjustable. I'm pretty small and normally these one size things are huge on me. This sinches nicely and the straps lay well. Quality is okay but for the price not surprising. Will be wearing this often.
This harness looked like it would be cute. However, it does not come assembled, and it's a little bit tricky to get it to the point where it needs to be.
I wear a 38c bra size while my chest and waist measurements are 40in and 34in respectively. This fit fine, I am able to adjust the straps to get a tighter fit.

I wore this today for the first time. It looks and feels great. Once you figure out how the straps go and size it to yourself, it’s very comfortable. I wish the  ends of the straps had a way to stay down securely though.. I feel like I’m checking often to make sure they didn’t come out of thing you stick the end of the strap through.. overall I’m very pleased with this product!

评论概述: easy to adjust to necessary size
评论详情: it looks great with anything - white shirt or dress. Quality is good, honestly I was not expecting that, but totally worth the money I have spent.
I bought this to elevate a simple black dress and I’m obsessed! Do it. Order it. ROCK IT! Decent quality not uncomfortable! I’m a 38 H and it fit great with room to make it bigger or smaller!
It just didn't fit like I had hoped. I tried it in with shirts and body suits and was unhappy with the fit. The two straps at the bottom didn't hit in the waist where I felt it would be flattering.
The grommets that hold it together are flimsy. Tried it on when it came in and it practically disintegrated. Grommets fall apart, it left black on my skin and the fabric I layered under.
Good quality and looks great. What more can you ask. Highly recommend.
Fits well

Overall I am very pleased with this harness - especially given the price, compared with one you’d purchase from free people for example- which would be genuine leather but four times as expensive. It takes some time to figure out placement of straps and to adjust the fit- directions for application/wear would have increased my review to 5 stars.  I wore this to a girls night over a white dress shirt. Then last weekend over a military style blazer - the harness was very adjustable to both thicknesses of tops. I am a size 12/L and this was true to size as described in the listing.

Loved it! Came folded and worried about the creases but once it was on it was unnoticeable. Hard to figure out at first but love layering over dresses and shirts for an added accessory! Sizing had plenty of options and was overall comfortable to wear. 10/10 recommend.
Buy it! Must have!

I have been wanting one of these for a while and I'm a bigger girl so I've been hesitant on getting one. Finally decided to try one out with my measurements, and it's not bad. I can it into it, but due to my size (and stomach curve) if I want the bottom two buckles in the front to not be crushed onto eachother I'm going to have to make one more hole to loosen it a but more. I knew that was a risk since I'm 1/2 inch less than the max measurement for that part, so all in all, as good as expected.
This product came with zero instructions on how to put on. I do not recommend. I returned it.
Very fun and cute. Go with a lot of outfits
Was sad it didn’t fit was small

评论概述: not for bigger girls, okay quality
评论详情: first thing i noticed was that there was a lot of black flakes coming off of the harness. buttons and straps were all intact though.  second thing i noticed was that it's not really for anyone with a waist bigger than 35 inches (90 cm), it would already be pretty tight if you wear it on top of a slightly thick shirt/dress/sweater. overall an okay purchase, may update after a few uses on quality.

评论概述: Cute, not the best quality, but cute!
评论详情: I like this over sweaters and tshirts! Adds a little flare to it. I like that everything is adjustable.

I wanted to love this so badly. My sizing ranges anywhere from a medium to an XL depending on the brand so I was pretty hopeful. Sadly it barely clasps, there is no way I could wear this in public without looking like someone punched a playdo can
Really well made and fits perfect.
Simple and cute barely fits me as a 2XL but still cheaper than most belts out there
